p: The FEEDAP Panel considers that two types of preparations fall into the definition ‘lemon oil distilled’: (i) lemon oil distilled (residual fraction) which corresponds to the residual fraction (i.e. the residues) from the distillation of lemon oil expressed and (ii) lemon oil distilled (volatile fraction), which corresponds to the volatile fraction (i.e. the distillate) from the distillation of lemon oil expressed.
